DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) prevent respiratory tract infection patient primary immunodeficiency .

DOC.criteria: Age 1875 Increased number respiratory tract infection At least 42 day infection 2008 2009 S25 OH vitamin D3 < 250 nM Not plan pregnancy come year Accepting use contraceptive 1 year Continuous antibiotic treatment Hypercalcemia Sarcoidosis Kidney disease Tuberculosis Pregnancy Kidney stone Heart medication ( glycoside )
